articles.author: Stephen Holder
articles.title: Indianapolis Colts owner and CEO Jim Irsay dies at 65 - ESPN
articles.description: Colts owner Jim Irsay, who had led the team since 1997 and presided over one of the storied franchise's greatest eras, has died.
articles.content:
INDIANAPOLIS -- Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay, who had led the team since 1997 and presided over one of the storied franchise's greatest eras, died Wednesday. He was 65.
"We are devastated to a… [+10234 chars]
